name: awesome-cordova-library
description: Awesome library to help to use Cordova

scripts.build: npm run build:device && npm run build:localstorage && npm run build:nativeaudio && npm run build:screenorientation && npm run build:socialsharing && npm run build:splashscreen && npm run build:statusbar && npm run build:vibration
scripts.install: npm run install:device && npm run install:localstorage && npm run install:nativeaudio && npm run install:screenorientation && npm run install:socialsharing && npm run install:splashscreen && npm run install:statusbar && npm run install:vibration
scripts.test: npm run test:device && npm run test:localstorage && npm run test:nativeaudio && npm run test:screenorientation && npm run test:socialsharing && npm run test:splashscreen && npm run test:statusbar && npm run test:vibration
scripts.lint: npm run lint:device && npm run lint:localstorage && npm run lint:nativeaudio && npm run lint:screenorientation && npm run lint:socialsharing && npm run lint:splashscreen && npm run lint:statusbar && npm run lint:vibration

author: AZOULAY Jordan <jazoulay@joazco.com>
